items.q: Did they get up very early last Sunday?
items.a: Yes, they did.

items.q: Did father start the car?
items.a: No, he didn't.

items.q: Did the car move?
items.a: No, the car didn't move.

items.q: Isn't there any petrol in the tank?
items.a: Yes, there isn't any petrol in the tank.

items.q: Can Jimmy go to the garage?
items.a: No, he can't.

items.q: Is the garage shut?
items.a: Yes, it is.

items.q: Will father and mother stay in the car?
items.a: No, they won't.

items.q: Won't the children stay in the car?
items.a: Yes, they will.

items.q: Did the children go to sleep?
items.a: No, they didn't.

items.q: Do they go to the country on Sundays or do they stay at home?
items.a: They go to the country on Sundays but they don't stay at home.

items.q: Did they get up early or late last Sunday?
items.a: They got up early, but they didn't get up late.

items.q: Were mother and father ready at 6:30 or at 10:00 o'clock?
items.a: They were ready at 6:30 but they weren't ready at 10 o'clock.

items.q: Did father start the engine or did Jimmy start it?
items.a: Father started the engine but Jimmy didn't start it.

items.q: Is there any petrol in the tank or is the tank empty?
items.a: The tank is empty and there isn't any petrol.

items.q: Will Jimmy get some petrol, or will he stay in the car?
items.a: Jimmy will get some petrol but he will not stay in the car.

items.q: Is the garage open or shut?
items.a: The garage is shut but it is not open.

items.q: Did mother and father go back to bed, or did they stay in the car?
items.a: Mother and father went back to bed, but they didn't stay in the car.

items.q: Did father wake up the children or did mother wake up the children?
items.a: Father woke up the children but the mother didn't wake up the children.

items.q: When does father take the children to the country?
items.a: Father takes the children to the country on Sundays.

items.q: At what time were mother and father ready?
items.a: Mother and father were ready at 6:30.

items.q: Whose car was it?
items.a: It was my father's car.

items.q: Where did father sit?
items.a: Father sat behind the wheel.

items.q: Why did mother and father go back to bed?
items.a: They went back to bed because the car wouldn't start and the garage was shut.

items.q: What did the children do?
items.a: Jimmy and I stayed in the car and didn't go back to sleep.

items.q: When did father knock at the window of the car?
items.a: Father knocked at the window of the car at nine o'clock.
